name: iMaiGuard
0:
”Alexa, show the front door”
”Alexa, show the living room”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
"With an Advantec camera, you can stay with what you care anywhere anytime. From now on, access your Advantec cameras using voice commands. Free your hands and enjoy a smarter life!

To get started with the iMaiGuard skill:
1.Log into iMaiGuard APP and name your camera (for example, living room, front door, etc. ).
2.From the Alexa app, find and enable iMaiGuard skill, login with your Advantec account.
3.Tap DISCOVER DEVICES in Alexa APP to discover your Advantec cameras.

After linking your iMaiGuard account and discovering your Advantec cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming live video to your Echo Show with commands like:
- ""Alexa, show the front door""
- ""Alexa, show the living room""
To stop your Advantec camera from streaming video, you can say:
- ""Alexa, stop""

Compatible Amazon Alexa devices:
* Echo Show
* Echo Spot
* Fire TV
* Fire TV Cube
* Fire TV Stick (2nd gen)
* Fire TV Edition smart TVs
* Fire Tablets (7th gen and above)

Important Notes：
1. Before streaming your Advantec camera, please make sure the Video Encryption is not enabled.
2. Please note that two-way talk is only available within the iMaiGuard App
3. When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of your camera.

More information is available at www.amcrest.com
If you have any questions about iMaiGuard Skill, please contact Amcrest Support: info.alexa@imaiguard.com"
